Thailand: chǎn maa jàak bprà-thêet thai → I come from Thailand
England: phǒm maa jàak bprà-thêet ang-grìt → I come from England
United States: chǎn maa jàak bprà-thêet à-mee-rí-gaa → I come from the USA
Japan: phǒm maa jàak bprà-thêet yîi-bpùn → I come from Japan
France: chǎn maa jàak bprà-thêet fà-ràng-sèet → I come from France
India: phǒm maa jàak bprà-thêet in-diiia → I come from India
